website_summaries.verdict: A great multi-purpose kit. Not quite as extensive as comparable models, but a good option if you prefer a brace to a sleeve.
pros: 2 silicone toe separators with bunion guard offer comfort and protection with shoes
Includes big toe strap for corrective exercises
cons: Some report trouble wearing the brace with shoes

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a painful bunion, just buy this! I only received this today, but the amount of pain it all relieves is remarkable. The sleeve thing is SOO comfortable and works great with shoes. The band to stretch and strengthen is great. But the second I put the brace on, it immediately relieved pain. Don’t give this purchase a second thought, I can’t believe how cheap it is vs how well it all works! I would give 10 stars if possible!!
customer_reviews.author: Athena Zappela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tried them on, feel the impact, they should help short or long term
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the brace. I'm not sure it is making my bunion (only one foot has one) smaller, but it feels much better. I was experiencing a lot pain related to this bunion. I only put it on occasionally for about an hour. I believe it would help more if I used it regularly. My big toe does seem to encroach less on the others for some time after I've worn the brace. I plan to get into a routine of using it, or at least use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Techgator

customer_reviews.title: Witty orthopedic help
customer_reviews.text: The silcone bunion shields are simply wonderful; The exerciser band builds strength. I see a small difference in my bunion straightening using the corrector. Hoperfully, as I continue to use the corrector they will continue to straighten.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bess

customer_reviews.title: Works: yes. Comfortable: not really. Instructions would have been nice.
customer_reviews.text: I don't find them as comfortable as some users but they do seem to be effective. I can't wear the splint piece with shoes on. One star deduction for no instructions for what really is a medical device.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works well for big toe, not so well for second toe
customer_reviews.text: This brace does everything my old brace did, and almost as well. The straps for the second toe are a great idea, but they don’t work very well. The Velcro doesn’t hold, it pops open a few min after securing. When I do get it to stay secured, the second toe tends to start bending at the buckle instead of staying I. The proper position. Maybe a second strap farther down, or a wider strap to emerald more of the toe would work better. Still a h hmmm oof brace that gives over night relief, helps to prevent big toe from progressing inward and may even correct the toe position over a long period of use
customer_reviews.author: J L O

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to the white small rubbery bunion corrector/toe spacer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this only needing the larger bunion corrector w/the blue Velcro strap. I really only needed the white leather strap that goes at the top bc I already have one I ordered years ago. I couldn’t order the single white leather strap. This order came w/3 items. The white rubbery ones have me an allergic reaction. I wore it all night & felt it itching & burning when I woke up & took my sock off, my foot was red like it had been burned. Not sure why this happened
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Elly

customer_reviews.title: I received this product and all of the pieces are ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and all of the pieces are here. However, there are No instructions on how to use this product...???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worth returning let alone WEARING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth returning. I may have lost 12$ but the seller has lost a customer. This Bunion corrector has got to be the most uncomfortable product I've tried. The product is stiff and the velcro straps are sharp! And forget being able to walk around the house in it. I will not be suggesting anyone buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed that the soft splints have already torn
customer_reviews.text: My bunions found relief with this product. I am disappointed that the soft splints have already torn. I am very careful at removing them because they are delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Swofford

customer_reviews.title: the pain in my toe got much better. In few days
customer_reviews.text: From the first day I wore them, the pain in my toe got much better. In few days, My toe felt normal. I have a toe arthritis. The doctor said it could be because of the flat feet which causes pressure on the toes while walking. The bunion corrector takes the pressure away from the toe when it separates it from the other toes, which should slow down the deformation of the bones from the arthritis. That with arch support shoes and a custom made insoles really help.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Poulos

customer_reviews.title: well we all know your bunion will not be corrected ...
customer_reviews.text: well we all know your bunion will not be corrected by wearing this- BUT it does help to relief pain and some of the swelling that comes with the pain. as long as that is the reason for your purchase is to reduce he pain that can accompany bunions then by all means -get them.
customer_reviews.author: S Sef

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for sure!
customer_reviews.text: So I just got these and slipped them on.... I have pretty bad bunions... when I wear any closed shoe, after an hour or so, my bunions are throbbing. I don’t want to go through surgery so I’m praying these will do the trick. I have to say that I think they are pretty comfortable... they look a little strange, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to use. Either it is too soft, or too tight and starts hurting. No way I could have it worn all night
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t really even give this one star. It’s trash; don’t waste your money! The straps are so uncomfortable that it’s ridiculous. Put it on and then slide yourself under the cover and you know this is NOT an option to wear - ugh!!!
customer_reviews.author: glorigirl

customer_reviews.title: instructions missing!
customer_reviews.text: How can I say for sure if I like this or not? There were NO INSTRUCTIONS in the package. I have many questions: how to use, when to use, how long to use, etc. Am I putting it on correctly? What are the other pieces for? I paid for the product, is it too much to ask for instructions to be included???
customer_reviews.author: Lyla F. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: They help greatly
customer_reviews.text: Got the item when promised at a good price. Will order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: MGC

customer_reviews.title: Did not work very well for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not need all the items included, so cannot rate all of it. I did use the gel guard and it tore very easily. That's why only 3 stars. ej
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Toe spacer
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep my toes straight. To undo what pointed toe shoes have done.
customer_reviews.author: Rose  k.

customer_reviews.title: These are actually working!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome - lots of bang for your buck. Easy to clean, high quality, and very comfortable. I inherited the family bunions and am hoping to avoid them worsening and avoid surgery. I felt like there was a difference in the way my toes were lying the first week after I wore them around the clock. Now.... if only I could remember to wear them every day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Takes some of the pain out of my foot that I experienced at night
customer_reviews.author: Edith Candella

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in sealed plastic bags, with no instructions. Poor quality, two of the pieces broke within a week of wear. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gtowner

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I found him very uncomfortable to wear. You definitely cannot walk in them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. It doesn’t work at all and hurts my foot. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Linda and Peter Tarantino

customer_reviews.title: Definitely give these a try!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure at first,but relief the first time I put them on. Will continue to use them every night.I also put them on if we’re just relaxing watching t.v.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Pace

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: This product is so comfortable and seems to help with the discomfort that I was feeling in my shoes. I hope it helps. I was very pleased with the packaging and the quality of the product. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lansky

customer_reviews.title: Bunion Corrector Relief
customer_reviews.text: So far they are the most relief I have been able to get. They are extremely soft and comfortable to wear. I was able to wear my dress shows today without being absolutely miserable at the end of the day. I would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Delores Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, bought because I noticed my toes weren't straight, the bunion pad is comfortable but after a while it feel little tied. The toe separator is excellent, I am able to wear them with my pair of Lems gym shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Judy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tools
customer_reviews.text: So far so good- it’s only been a few days. I am hoping for good results. I have worn the sleeve for the foot with the bunion nightly and and I am doing my 5 minute exercises each night but not morning. I will add that after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Foot was sore for a little while but now it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: They work great. But the soft corrector ( white one) ripped
customer_reviews.author: Urbons2

customer_reviews.title: Best bunion relief!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my feet. I had bunion surgery about a year ago and am doing my best to keep my feet straightened. This set has worked very very well and it’s not the least bit uncomfortable. The directions are also easy to follow when setting up the braces.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Goldwyn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these for 2 months and no difference in my bunion size or pain.
customer_reviews.author: CarolR

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: After waking up in pain for the last month I ordered this based on the reviews and it was cheap. For the first time in the last month, I've been pain free. I'd definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Hagey

customer_reviews.title: These things with elastic bands work well. But the ...
customer_reviews.text: These things with elastic bands work well. But the silicone pieces broke for a second attempt to use them ... So sad
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Novikova

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Idea is great, design is horrible, the velcro straps should be permanently on the unit
customer_reviews.author: r stone

customer_reviews.title: total piece of crap - unwrapped it
customer_reviews.text: total piece of crap - unwrapped it, put it on, and the plastic splint bent under the (Very light) force needed to push my big toe away from the others and put into place. AVOID!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It helps stretch the ligaments in the toes and provided much needed pain relief. Hopefully this will be a long term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: This corrector had my foot hurting way worse with them on than without. Go for rubber instead
customer_reviews.author: Kanedria Bundage

customer_reviews.title: Great product but broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s has helped me with my running a lot. But I haven’t used it much and one of the correctors has broken. Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: Ya

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Could not wear! The hard plastic was too uncomfortable. Caused contusion and blister. It need some sort of lining.
customer_reviews.author: claudia duke

customer_reviews.title: Bunion correcter
customer_reviews.text: There was no instructions with it,like how long are you spise to wear them and how long
customer_reviews.author: Catelin hammond

customer_reviews.title: I think I will like them.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive instructions. Please provide! I think I will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Fanney

customer_reviews.title: very useful for relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: I like playing batminton 3 time a week,sometimes I hurt my foot when I rush forward, this product can protect foot and it is very helpful,nice product
customer_reviews.author: Leolac.Alba

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Actually I was a little septic about this item. But surprisingly it is working well. Very comfortable and useful as well. I am happy that I did not miss this item in a huge ocean of my favorite Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jefe ner

customer_reviews.title: Love the silicon toe separators
customer_reviews.text: Love the silicon toe separators. Wear them with my shoes. Use the splint at night. Haven’t tried the exerciser.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and a mandatory part of my dress code is leather shoes. My bunion started hurting so much I wanted to cry just thinking about putting my shoes on. This product gave almost instant relief. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to wear for long time
customer_reviews.text: The night time splint works fine for short periods of time. But because it restricts the toe from flexing, it is difficult to walk (e.g. to the bathroom). And it is uncomfortable to wear for a long time. It's no different than putting a bandage on a finger joint. After a while you feel like peeling it off to move the joint. Hopefully I would get more used to it. If not I will try another brand that allows flexing. There is a difference between the left and right splint which is not clearly indicated. If you put it on the wrong side your toe would be forced slightly downwards. I have not tried the toe separators.
customer_reviews.author: Piu

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: This is a good idea (better than competing products), BUT the execution is very poor. It is rickety and uncomfortable. Re-manufacture to a higher standard and they could charge twice as much. Also there were no instructions included and there are pieces for which there was no apparent use. I tore mine apart to see if I could somehow modify it to be usable. Will work more ion it in future, in the interim it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: lokalyokal

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Got the package on time. Is to soon to said if it works but it feels comfortable to use. The only down side is that there's no picture instructions on how to used. Have to go back to the Amazon app to see the pictures on how to put it on. Hopefully it works down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Mariluz Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable. I sleep in it. I liked this product so much that i bought another. My original is about 7 years old and still working great. My foot doctor recommended this product to me to prevent surgery and we both have seen tremendous improvement and results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device from my bunions he’s very uncomfortable and I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This device from my bunions he’s very uncomfortable and I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: sharon Solano

customer_reviews.title: For your feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she doesn't use them but they were fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Anh-Bao

customer_reviews.title: A Good Reason to buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I would never have known how to use the splint without the valuable photos posted by the Amazon customers. Thank you all. You are so very helpful. I just put it on for the first time and it's not really comfortable, but if it works it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Paton

customer_reviews.title: only need the blue and white pieces
customer_reviews.text: my wife likes the main night time big toe device shown wearing, the other two parts not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Pell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: The straps are so uncomfortable. Its not helping in anyway and not supporting the toe. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: rashmi bandi

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed by the photo here at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this photo of a middle finger when I looked here about my order.Actully really pissed of.What is the meaning of this?
customer_reviews.author: chris Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The silicon toe separator torn after a few days use
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure about his, it is a type of torture.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dattoli

customer_reviews.title: Is this supposed to hurt?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how to feel. Are they supposed to make my bunions hurt..?
customer_reviews.author: april n rountree

product_meta.title: Bunion Corrector Adjustable Bunion Splint Night Time Soft Gel for Bunion Relief, Bunion Corrector and Bunion Relief Protector Brace Kit for Big Toes, Bunion Pads, Toe Straightener, Toe Separators
feature_bullets: Treat your feet with our carefully selected 5 pieces set.The package is designed for bunion Corrector and bunion relief. One Size Fits Most Feet.
Relieve your pain, treat your bunion, reduce friction between your toes and enjoy walking again. Separate, straighten, stretch and align your toes.
A unique solution for your foot problems. Cure the pain in big toe joint, tailors bunion and much more.
Made from 100% stretchable and soft medical grade gel.Premium quality and perfect fit, soft and stretchable - easy to clean & reuse.

Enjoy the secure bunion relief protector sleeves kit.These bunion toe straightener sleeves are one size fits most feet which can be enjoyed by men and women alike and snug fitting bunion socks won't slide.
